response.answer_text: There are games that are “Copy locked” wich means it's copyrighted and other things are copyrighted too. But most are not and you will find some Roblox game rip offs or games in Roblox copied based on a game in Roblox. As Pokemon Brick Bronze was copyrighted by The Pokemon Company and soon was down and that's just a example of a outside game copyright

Roblox games are protected by copyright* *There is an option to remove copylock. If you do remove it, anyone has the right to grab the game and post it. So if you don’t want people publishing your game without you knowing or allowing. Make sure to not remove the copylock feature.
The developer of a game can choose to copyright their code and sue if their code is copied for monetization purposes.
